author: Daily Mail Australia Reporter
title: Kyle Sandilands says Richard Wilkins 'has a huge penis' | Daily Mail Online
text: Jackie then shot back: 'He's got a Richard Wilkins rumour going around.' Without pulling any punches, Kyle responded: 'Richard Wilkins is renowned for his huge penis.' 'He's got a Richard Wilkins rumour going around!' Jackie mentioned that singer John Mayer is rumoured to have a large appendage, similar to Today star Richard Without pulling any punches, Kyle responded: 'Richard Wilkins is renowned for his huge penis' This isn't the first time that Richard's sizable prize has been discussed on The Kyle & Jackie O Show. During an appearance on the radio program in 2015, gossip guru Richard Reid revealed that he'd once caught a glimpse of Wilkins' willy. ‘I saw a flash of it! Our dressing rooms were next to each other’s forever and I saw a flash of it one day, just a flash!!’ he exclaimed. Feeling cocky? The 62-year-old Today show reporter has a reputation as a ladies man The openly gay Reid also revealed that he and the 'adorable' Wilkins were once mistaken for a couple while out together in Las Vegas. While Richard hasn't enjoyed a romance with Reid, he has been linked to a number of high profile beauties over the years. Last year, actress Rebecca Gibney revealed that she had been 'madly in love' with Richard when the pair dated briefly in their youth. '‘I saw a flash of it!' Gossip guri Richard Reid claims to have seen Wilkins' willy, but failed to go into specifics about the size Bigger is better? Richard has previously been romantically linked to busty Block star and former Penthouse model Suzi Taylor 'I gave him a rose and he took it on the plane and I said "I'll see you soon sweetheart".' 'He gave the rose to the flight attendant who he was having a fling with!' she confessed to Nova 96.9's Fitzy and Wippa. More recently, Richard was linked to busty reality star Suzi Taylor. 'He gave the rose to the flight attendant who he was having a fling with!' Actress Rebecca Gibney opened up about having her heart broken by Richard when they dated years ago Read more: Share or comment on this article 241
